creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: standing figure with both hands outstretched with palms up; figure wears brass crown decorated with phoenixes and adorned with glass beads, trailing down over shoulders; round metal halo on back with flaming Buddhist jewels
medium: Wood with polychrome and gold, brass, glass beads
title: Zenmyō nyoshin, the Goddess Shanmiao
